rummy.game.domain.meld

Class SetMeld

  • java.lang.Object
    • rummy.game.domain.meld.Meld
      • rummy.game.domain.meld.SetMeld

  • public class SetMeld
extends Meld
    Represents a set meld. A set meld is a group of cards having the same rank.
